text: Mary Loretta Philbin (July 16, 1902 – May 7, 1993)"California Death Index, 1940–1997," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:VP2K-JTB : 26 November 2014), Mary Loretta Philbin, 07 May 1993; Department of Public Health Services, Sacramento. was an American actress. She was best known for playing Christine Daaé in the 1925 movie The Phantom of the Opera and as Dea in The Man Who Laughs. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:1993 deaths Category:American silent movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Mary Philbin
